   19: 
   20: -module(erl_scan_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([error_1/1, error_2/1, iso88591/1, otp_7810/1, otp_10302/1,
   26: 	 otp_10990/1, otp_10992/1, otp_11807/1, otp_16480/1, otp_17024/1,
   27:          text_fun/1]).
   28: 
   29: -import(lists, [nth/2,flatten/1]).
   30: -import(io_lib, [print/1]).
   31: 
   32: %%
   33: %% Define to run outside of test server
   34: %%
   35: %%-define(STANDALONE,1).
   36: 
   37: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   38: -compile(export_all).
   39: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   40: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   41: -define(t, test_server).
   42: %% config(priv_dir, _) ->
   43: %%     ".";
   44: %% config(data_dir, _) ->
   45: %%     ".".
   46: -else.
   47: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   48: -endif.
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: suite() ->
   57:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:      {timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
   59: 
   60: all() -> 
   61:     [{group, error}, iso88591, otp_7810, otp_10302, otp_10990, otp_10992,
   62:      otp_11807, otp_16480, otp_17024, text_fun].
   63: 
   64: groups() -> 
   65:     [{error, [], [error_1, error_2]}].
   66: 
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: 
   80: 
   81: %% (OTP-2347)
   82: error_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     {error, _, _} = erl_scan:string("'a"),
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: %% Checks that format_error works on the error cases.
   87: error_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, error_cases()),
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: error_cases() ->
   92:     ["'a",
   93:      "\"a",
   94:      "'\\",
   95:      "\"\\",
   96:      "$",
   97:      "$\\",
   98:      "2.3e",
   99:      "2.3e-",
  100:      "91#9"
  101:     ].
  102: 
  103: assert_type(N, integer) when is_integer(N) ->
  104:     ok;
  105: assert_type(N, atom) when is_atom(N) ->
  106:     ok.
  107: 
  108: check(String) ->
  109:     Error = erl_scan:string(String),
  110:     check_error(Error, erl_scan).
  111: 
  112: %%% (This should be useful for all format_error functions.)
  113: check_error({error, Info, EndLine}, Module0) ->
  114:     {ErrorLine, Module, Desc} = Info,
  115:     true = (Module == Module0),
  116:     assert_type(EndLine, integer),
  117:     assert_type(ErrorLine, integer),
  118:     true = (ErrorLine =< EndLine),
  119:     String = lists:flatten(Module0:format_error(Desc)),
  120:     true = io_lib:printable_list(String).
  121: 
  122: %% Tests the support for ISO-8859-1 i.e Latin-1.
  123: iso88591(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  124:     ok =
  125: 	case catch begin
  126: 		       %% Some atom and variable names
  127: 		       V1s = [$Á,$á,$é,$ë],
  128: 		       V2s = [$N,$ä,$r],
  129: 		       A1s = [$h,$ä,$r],
  130: 		       A2s = [$ö,$r,$e],
  131: 		       %% Test parsing atom and variable characters.
  132: 		       {ok,Ts1,_} = erl_scan_string(V1s ++ " " ++ V2s ++
  133: 							"\327" ++
  134: 							A1s ++ " " ++ A2s),
  135: 		       V1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(1, Ts1))),
  136: 		       V2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(2, Ts1))),
  137: 		       A1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(4, Ts1))),
  138: 		       A2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(5, Ts1))),
  139: 		       %% Test printing atoms
  140: 		       A1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(4, Ts1)))),
  141: 		       A2s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(5, Ts1)))),
  142: 		       %% Test parsing and printing strings.
  143: 		       S1 = V1s ++ "\327" ++ A1s ++ "\250" ++ A2s,
  144: 		       S1s = "\"" ++ S1 ++ "\"",
  145: 		       {ok,Ts2,_} = erl_scan_string(S1s),
  146: 		       S1 = element(3, nth(1, Ts2)),
  147: 		       S1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(1, Ts2)))),
  148: 		       ok				%It all worked
  149: 		   end of
  150: 	    {'EXIT',R} ->				%Something went wrong!
  151: 		{error,R};
  152: 	    ok -> ok				%Aok
  153: 	end.
  154: 
  155: %% OTP-7810. White spaces, comments, and more...
  156: otp_7810(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  157:     ok = reserved_words(),
  158:     ok = atoms(),
  159:     ok = punctuations(),
  160:     ok = comments(),
  161:     ok = errors(),
  162:     ok = integers(),
  163:     ok = base_integers(),
  164:     ok = floats(),
  165:     ok = dots(),
  166:     ok = chars(),
  167:     ok = variables(),
  168:     ok = eof(),
  169:     ok = illegal(),
  170:     ok = crashes(),
  171: 
  172:     ok = options(),
  173:     ok = token_info(),
  174:     ok = column_errors(),
  175:     ok = white_spaces(),
  176: 
  177:     ok = unicode(),
  178: 
  179:     ok = more_chars(),
  180:     ok = more_options(),
  181:     ok = anno_info(),
  182: 
  183:     ok.
  184: 
  185: reserved_words() ->
  186:     L = ['after', 'begin', 'case', 'try', 'cond', 'catch',
  187:          'andalso', 'orelse', 'end', 'fun', 'if', 'let', 'of',
  188:          'receive', 'when', 'bnot', 'not', 'div',
  189:          'rem', 'band', 'and', 'bor', 'bxor', 'bsl', 'bsr',
  190:          'or', 'xor'],
  191:     [begin
  192:          {RW, true} = {RW, erl_scan:reserved_word(RW)},
  193:          S = atom_to_list(RW),
  194:          Ts = [{RW,{1,1}}],
  195:          test_string(S, Ts)
  196:      end || RW <- L],
  197:     ok.
  198: 
  199: 
  200: atoms() ->
  201:     test_string("a
  202:                  b", [{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,18},b}]),
  203:     test_string("'a b'", [{atom,{1,1},'a b'}]),
  204: 		test_string("a", [{atom,{1,1},a}]),
  205: 		test_string("a@2", [{atom,{1,1},a@2}]),
  206: 		test_string([39,65,200,39], [{atom,{1,1},'AÈ'}]),
  207: 		test_string("ärlig östen", [{atom,{1,1},ärlig},{atom,{1,7},östen}]),
  208: 		{ok,[{atom,_,'$a'}],{1,6}} =
  209: 		    erl_scan_string("'$\\a'", {1,1}),
  210: 		test("'$\\a'"),
  211: 		ok.
  212: 
  213: punctuations() ->
  214:     L = ["<<", "<-", "<=", "<", ">>", ">=", ">", "->", "--",
  215:          "-", "++", "+", "=:=", "=/=", "=<", "=>", "==", "=", "/=",
  216:          "/", "||", "|", ":=", "::", ":"],
  217:     %% One token at a time:
  218:     [begin
  219:          W = list_to_atom(S),
  220:          Ts = [{W,{1,1}}],
  221:          test_string(S, Ts)
  222:      end || S <- L],
  223:     Three = ["/=:=", "<=:=", "==:=", ">=:="], % three tokens...
  224:     No = Three ++ L,
  225:     SL0 = [{S1++S2,{-length(S1),S1,S2}} ||
  226:               S1 <- L,
  227:               S2 <- L,
  228:               not lists:member(S1++S2, No)],
  229:     SL = family_list(SL0),
  230:     %% Two tokens. When there are several answers, the one with
  231:     %% the longest first token is chosen:
  232:     %% [the special case "=<<" is among the tested ones]
  233:     [begin
  234:          W1 = list_to_atom(S1),
  235:          W2 = list_to_atom(S2),
  236:          Ts = [{W1,{1,1}},{W2,{1,-L2+1}}],
  237:          test_string(S, Ts)
  238:      end || {S,[{L2,S1,S2}|_]}  <- SL],
  239: 
  240:     PTs1 = [{'!',{1,1}},{'(',{1,2}},{')',{1,3}},{',',{1,4}},{';',{1,5}},
  241:             {'=',{1,6}},{'[',{1,7}},{']',{1,8}},{'{',{1,9}},{'|',{1,10}},
  242:             {'}',{1,11}}],
  243:     test_string("!(),;=[]{|}", PTs1),
  244: 
  245:     PTs2 = [{'#',{1,1}},{'&',{1,2}},{'*',{1,3}},{'+',{1,4}},{'/',{1,5}},
  246:             {':',{1,6}},{'<',{1,7}},{'>',{1,8}},{'?',{1,9}},{'@',{1,10}},
  247:             {'\\',{1,11}},{'^',{1,12}},{'`',{1,13}},{'~',{1,14}}],
  248:     test_string("#&*+/:<>?@\\^`~", PTs2),
  249: 
  250:     test_string(".. ", [{'..',{1,1}}]),
  251:     test_string("1 .. 2",
  252:                 [{integer,{1,1},1},{'..',{1,3}},{integer,{1,6},2}]),
  253:     test_string("...", [{'...',{1,1}}]),
  254:     ok.
  255: 
  256: comments() ->
  257:     test("a %%\n b"),
  258:     {ok,[],1} = erl_scan_string("%"),
  259:     test("a %%\n b"),
  260:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  261:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b", {1,1}),
  262:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{comment,{1,3},"%%"},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  263:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1}, [return_comments]),
  264:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  265:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  266:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  267:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  268:      {2,3}} =
  269:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return_white_spaces]),
  270:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  271:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  272:          {comment,{1,3},"%%"},
  273:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  274:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  275:      {2,3}} = erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return]),
  276:     ok.
  277: 
  278: errors() ->
  279:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{string,$',"qa"}},1} = erl_scan:string("'qa"), %'
  280:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$',"qa"}},{1,4}} = %'
  281:         erl_scan:string("'qa", {1,1}, []), %'
  282:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{string,$","str"}},1} = %"
  283:         erl_scan:string("\"str"), %"
  284:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$","str"}},{1,5}} = %"
  285:         erl_scan:string("\"str", {1,1}, []), %"
  286:     {error,{1,erl_scan,char},1} = erl_scan:string("$"),
  287:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,2}} = erl_scan:string("$", {1,1}, []),
  288:     test_string([34,65,200,34], [{string,{1,1},"AÈ"}]),
  289:     test_string("\\", [{'\\',{1,1}}]),
  290:     {'EXIT',_} =
  291:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:string('$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  292:     {'EXIT',_} =
  293:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:tokens([], '$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  294: 
  295:     "{a,tuple}" = erl_scan:format_error({a,tuple}),
  296:     ok.
  297: 
  298: integers() ->
  299:     [begin
  300:          I = list_to_integer(S),
  301:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  302:          test_string(S, Ts)
  303:      end || S <- [[N] || N <- lists:seq($0, $9)] ++ ["2323","000"] ],
  304:     UnderscoreSamples =
  305:         [{"123_456", 123456},
  306:          {"123_456_789", 123456789},
  307:          {"1_2", 12}],
  308:     lists:foreach(
  309:          fun({S, I}) ->
  310:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  311:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  312:     UnderscoreErrors =
  313:         ["123_",
  314:          "123__",
  315:          "123_456_",
  316:          "123__456",
  317:          "_123",
  318:          "__123"],
  319:     lists:foreach(
  320:       fun(S) ->
  321:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  322:                   {ok, [{integer, _, _}], _} ->
  323:                       error({unexpected_integer, S});
  324:                   _ ->
  325:                       ok
  326:               end
  327:       end, UnderscoreErrors),
  328:     test_string("_123", [{var,{1,1},'_123'}]),
  329:     test_string("123_", [{integer,{1,1},123},{var,{1,4},'_'}]),
  330:     ok.
  331: 
  332: base_integers() ->
  333:     [begin
  334:          B = list_to_integer(BS),
  335:          I = erlang:list_to_integer(S, B),
  336:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  337:          test_string(BS++"#"++S, Ts)
  338:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"2","11"}, {"5","23234"}, {"12","05a"},
  339:                        {"16","abcdef"}, {"16","ABCDEF"}] ],
  340: 
  341:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  342:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1}},{1,2}} =
  343:         erl_scan:string("1#000", {1,1}, []),
  344: 
  345:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  346:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1000}},{1,6}} =
  347:         erl_scan:string("1_000#000", {1,1}, []),
  348: 
  349:     test_string("12#bc", [{integer,{1,1},11},{atom,{1,5},c}]),
  350: 
  351:     [begin
  352:          Str = BS ++ "#" ++ S,
  353:          E = 2 + length(BS),
  354:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},{1,E}} =
  355:              erl_scan:string(Str, {1,1}, [])
  356:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"3","3"},{"15","f"},{"12","c"},
  357:                        {"1_5","f"},{"1_2","c"}] ],
  358: 
  359:     {ok,[{integer,1,239},{'@',1}],1} = erl_scan_string("16#ef@"),
  360:     {ok,[{integer,{1,1},239},{'@',{1,6}}],{1,7}} =
  361:         erl_scan_string("16#ef@", {1,1}, []),
  362:     {ok,[{integer,{1,1},14},{atom,{1,5},g@}],{1,7}} =
  363:         erl_scan_string("16#eg@", {1,1}, []),
  364: 
  365:     UnderscoreSamples =
  366:         [{"16#1234_ABCD_EF56", 16#1234abcdef56},
  367:          {"2#0011_0101_0011", 2#001101010011},
  368:          {"1_6#123ABC", 16#123abc},
  369:          {"1_6#123_ABC", 16#123abc},
  370:          {"16#abcdef", 16#ABCDEF}],
  371:     lists:foreach(
  372:          fun({S, I}) ->
  373:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  374:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  375:     UnderscoreErrors =
  376:         ["16_#123ABC",
  377:          "16#123_",
  378:          "16#_123",
  379:          "16#ABC_",
  380:          "16#_ABC",
  381:          "2#_0101",
  382:          "1__6#ABC",
  383:          "16#AB__CD"],
  384:     lists:foreach(
  385:       fun(S) ->
  386:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  387:                   {ok, [{integer, _, _}], _} ->
  388:                       error({unexpected_integer, S});
  389:                   _ ->
  390:                       ok
  391:               end
  392:       end, UnderscoreErrors),
  393:     test_string("16#123_", [{integer,{1,1},291},{var,{1,7},'_'}]),
  394:     test_string("_16#ABC", [{var,{1,1},'_16'},{'#',{1,4}},{var,{1,5},'ABC'}]),
  395:     ok.
  396: 
  397: floats() ->
  398:     [begin
  399:          F = list_to_float(FS),
  400:          Ts = [{float,{1,1},F}],
  401:          test_string(FS, Ts)
  402:      end || FS <- ["1.0","001.17","3.31200","1.0e0","1.0E17",
  403:                    "34.21E-18", "17.0E+14"]],
  404:     test_string("1.e2", [{integer,{1,1},1},{'.',{1,2}},{atom,{1,3},e2}]),
  405: 
  406:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} =
  407:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400"),
  408:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,8}} =
  409:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400", {1,1}, []),
  410:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,9}} =
  411:         erl_scan:string("1.0e4_00", {1,1}, []),
  412:     [begin
  413:          {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(S),
  414:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,_}} =
  415:              erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])
  416:      end || S <- ["1.14Ea"]],
  417: 
  418:     UnderscoreSamples =
  419:         [{"123_456.789", 123456.789},
  420:          {"123.456_789", 123.456789},
  421:          {"1.2_345e10", 1.2345e10},
  422:          {"1.234e1_06", 1.234e106},
  423:          {"12_34.56_78e1_6", 1234.5678e16},
  424:          {"12_34.56_78e-1_8", 1234.5678e-18}],
  425:     lists:foreach(
  426:          fun({S, I}) ->
  427:                  test_string(S, [{float, {1, 1}, I}])
  428:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  429:     UnderscoreErrors =
  430:         ["123_.456",
  431:          "123._456",
  432:          "123.456_",
  433:          "123._",
  434:          "1._23e10",
  435:          "1.23e_10",
  436:          "1.23e10_"],
  437:     lists:foreach(
  438:       fun(S) ->
  439:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  440:                   {ok, [{float, _, _}], _} ->
  441:                       error({unexpected_float, S});
  442:                   _ ->
  443:                       ok
  444:               end
  445:       end, UnderscoreErrors),
  446:     test_string("123._", [{integer,{1,1},123},{'.',{1,4}},{var,{1,5},'_'}]),
  447:     test_string("1.23_e10", [{float,{1,1},1.23},{var,{1,5},'_e10'}]),
  448:     ok.
  449: 
  450: dots() ->
  451:     Dot = [{".",    {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,2}}},
  452:            {". ",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  453:            {".\n",  {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  454:            {".%",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  455:            {".\210",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  456:            {".% öh",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,6}}},
  457:            {".%\n", {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  458:            {".$",   {error,{1,erl_scan,char},1},
  459: 	    {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,3}}},
  460:            {".$\\", {error,{1,erl_scan,char},1},
  461:                     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,4}}},
  462:            {".a",   {ok,[{'.',1},{atom,1,a}],1},
  463: 	    {ok,[{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}],{1,3}}}
  464:           ],
  465:     [begin
  466:          R = erl_scan_string(S),
  467:          R2 = erl_scan_string(S, {1,1}, [])
  468:      end || {S, R, R2} <- Dot],
  469: 
  470:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T1],{1,2}} = erl_scan:string(".", {1,1}, text),
  471:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T1),
  472:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T2],{1,3}} = erl_scan:string(".%", {1,1}, text),
  473:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T2),
  474:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T3],{1,6}} =
  475:         erl_scan:string(".% öh", {1,1}, text),
  476:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T3),
  477:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,3}} = erl_scan:string(".$", {1,1}),
  478:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,char},{1,4}} = erl_scan:string(".$\\", {1,1}),
  479: 
  480:     test_string(". ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  481:     test_string(".  ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  482:     test_string(".\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  483:     test_string(".\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  484:     test_string(".\n\r", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  485:     test_string(".\n\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  486:     test_string(".\210", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  487:     test_string(".%\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  488:     test_string(".a", [{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}]),
  489: 
  490:     test_string("%. \n. ", [{dot,{2,1}}]),
  491:     {more,C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "%. ",{1,1}, return),
  492:     {done,{ok,[{comment,{1,1},"%. "},
  493:                {white_space,{1,4},"\n"},
  494:                {dot,{2,1}}],
  495:            {2,3}}, ""} =
  496:         erl_scan_tokens(C, "\n. ", {1,1}, return), % any loc, any options
  497: 
  498:     [test_string(S, R) ||
  499:         {S, R} <- [{".$\n",   [{'.',{1,1}},{char,{1,2},$\n}]},
  500:                    {"$\\\n",  [{char,{1,1},$\n}]},
  501:                    {"'\\\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]},
  502:                    {"$\n",    [{char,{1,1},$\n}]}] ],
  503:     ok.
  504: 
  505: chars() ->
  506:     [begin
  507:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~.8b", [C])),
  508:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  509:          test_string(L, Ts)
  510:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  511: 
  512:     %% Leading zeroes...
  513:     [begin
  514:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~3.8.0b", [C])),
  515:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  516:          test_string(L, Ts)
  517:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  518: 
  519:     %% $\^\n now increments the line...
  520:     [begin
  521:          L = "$\\^" ++ [C],
  522:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C band 2#11111}],
  523:          test_string(L, Ts)
  524:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  525: 
  526:     [begin
  527:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  528:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},V}],
  529:          test_string(L, Ts)
  530:      end || {C,V} <- [{$n,$\n}, {$r,$\r}, {$t,$\t}, {$v,$\v},
  531:                       {$b,$\b}, {$f,$\f}, {$e,$\e}, {$s,$\s},
  532:                       {$d,$\d}]],
  533: 
  534:     EC = [$\n,$\r,$\t,$\v,$\b,$\f,$\e,$\s,$\d],
  535:     Ds = lists:seq($0, $9),
  536:     X = [$^,$n,$r,$t,$v,$b,$f,$e,$s,$d],
  537:     New = [${,$x],
  538:     No = EC ++ Ds ++ X ++ New,
  539:     [begin
  540:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  541:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  542:          test_string(L, Ts)
  543:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  544: 
  545:     [begin
  546:          L = "'$\\" ++ [C] ++ "'",
  547:          Ts = [{atom,{1,1},list_to_atom("$"++[C])}],
  548:          test_string(L, Ts)
  549:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  550: 
  551:     test_string("\"\\013a\\\n\"", [{string,{1,1},"\va\n"}]),
  552: 
  553:     test_string("'\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]),
  554:     test_string("\"\n\a\"", [{string,{1,1},"\na"}]),
  555: 
  556:     %% No escape
  557:     [begin
  558:          L = "$" ++ [C],
  559:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  560:          test_string(L, Ts)
  561:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- (No ++ [$\\])],
  562:     test_string("$\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  563: 
  564:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,4}} =
  565:         erl_scan:string("$\\^",{1,1}),
  566:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  567:     %% Robert's scanner returns line 1:
  568:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  569:     test_string("$\n\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  570:     test("$\n\n"),
  571:     ok.
  572: 
  573: 
  574: variables() ->
  575:     test_string("     \237_Aouåeiyäö", [{var,{1,7},'_Aouåeiyäö'}]),
  576:     test_string("A_b_c@", [{var,{1,1},'A_b_c@'}]),
  577:     test_string("V@2", [{var,{1,1},'V@2'}]),
  578:     test_string("ABDÀ", [{var,{1,1},'ABDÀ'}]),
  579:     test_string("Ärlig Östen", [{var,{1,1},'Ärlig'},{var,{1,7},'Östen'}]),
  580:     ok.
  581: 
  582: eof() ->
  583:     {done,{eof,1},eof} = erl_scan:tokens([], eof, 1),
  584:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n", 1),
  585:     {done,{eof,2},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  586:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", 1),
  587:     %% An error before R13A.
  588:     %% {done,Err={error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  589:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,abra}],1},eof} =
  590:         erl_scan_tokens(C2, eof, 1),
  591: 
  592:     %% With column.
  593:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n",{1,1}),
  594:     {done,{eof,{2,1}},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
  595:     {more, C4} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", {1,1}),
  596:     %% An error before R13A.
  597:     %% {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,scan},{1,5}},eof} =
  598:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,abra}],{1,5}},eof} =
  599:         erl_scan_tokens(C4, eof, 1),
  600: 
  601:     %% Robert's scanner returns "" as LeftoverChars;
  602:     %% the R12B scanner returns eof as LeftoverChars: (eof is correct)
  603:     {more, C5} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", 1),
  604:     %% An error before R13A.
  605:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  606:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a}],1},eof} =
  607:         erl_scan_tokens(C5,eof,1),
  608: 
  609:     %% With column.
  610:     {more, C6} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", {1,1}),
  611:     %% An error before R13A.
  612:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  613:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a}],{1,2}},eof} =
  614:         erl_scan_tokens(C6,eof,1),
  615: 
  616:     %% A dot followed by eof is special:
  617:     {more, C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", 1),
  618:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a},{dot,1}],1},eof} = erl_scan_tokens(C,eof,1),
  619:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{dot,1}],1} = erl_scan_string("foo."),
  620: 
  621:     %% With column.
  622:     {more, CCol} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", {1,1}),
  623:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{dot,{1,2}}],{1,3}},eof} =
  624:         erl_scan_tokens(CCol,eof,1),
  625:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},foo},{dot,{1,4}}],{1,5}} =
  626:         erl_scan_string("foo.", {1,1}, []),
  627: 
  628:     ok.
  629: 
  630: illegal() ->
  631:     Atom = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
  632:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(Atom),
  633:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  634:         erl_scan:tokens([], Atom++". ", 1),
  635:     QAtom = "'" ++ Atom ++ "'",
  636:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(QAtom),
  637:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  638:         erl_scan:tokens([], QAtom++". ", 1),
  639:     Var = lists:duplicate(1000, $A),
  640:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1} = erl_scan:string(Var),
  641:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1},". "} =
  642:         erl_scan:tokens([], Var++". ", 1),
  643:     Float = "1" ++ lists:duplicate(400, $0) ++ ".0",
  644:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(Float),
  645:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1},". "} =
  646:         erl_scan:tokens([], Float++". ", 1),
  647:     String = "\"43\\x{aaaaaa}34\"",
  648:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} = erl_scan:string(String),
  649:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1},"34\". "} =
  650:         %% Would be nice if `34\"' were skipped...
  651:         %% Maybe, but then the LeftOverChars would not be the characters
  652:         %% immediately following the end location of the error.
  653:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", 1),
  654: 
  655:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1001}} =
  656:         erl_scan:string(Atom, {1,1}),
  657:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  658:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Atom++". ", {1,1}),
  659:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1003}} =
  660:         erl_scan:string(QAtom, {1,1}),
  661:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1007}},". "} =
  662:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++QAtom++". ", {1,1}),
  663:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1001}} =
  664:         erl_scan:string(Var, {1,1}),
  665:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  666:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Var++". ", {1,1}),
  667:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,404}} =
  668:         erl_scan:string(Float, {1,1}),
  669:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,408}},". "} =
  670:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Float++". ", {1,1}),
  671:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}} =
  672:         erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}),
  673:     {done,{error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}},"34\". "} =
  674:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", {1,1}),
  675:     ok.
  676: 
  677: crashes() ->
  678:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([-1])}), % type error
  679:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[-1])}),
  680:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[-1])}),
  681:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[-1])}),
  682:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"],{1,1})}),
  683:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[-1,$"])}), %$"
  684:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"])}),
  685:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1])}),
  686:     {'EXIT',_} =
  687:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1],{1,1})}),
  688: 
  689:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([a])}), % type error
  690:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[a])}),
  691:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[a])}),
  692:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[a])}),
  693:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"],{1,1})}),
  694:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[a,$"])}), %$"
  695:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"])}),
  696:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a])}),
  697:     {'EXIT',_} =
  698:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a],{1,1})}),
  699: 
  700:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([3.0])}), % type error
  701: 
  702:     ok.
  703: 
  704: options() ->
  705:     %% line and column are not options, but tested here
  706:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "},{comment,1,"% bar"}], 1} =
  707:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return),
  708:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "}],1} =
  709:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_white_spaces),
  710:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{comment,1,"% bar"}],1} =
  711:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_comments),
  712:     {ok,[{atom,17,foo}],17} =
  713:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 17),
  714:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  715:         (catch {foo,
  716:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {a,1}, [])}), % type error
  717:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}],{17,18}} =
  718:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", {17,9}, []),
  719:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  720:         (catch {foo,
  721:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {1,0}, [])}), % type error
  722:     {ok,[{foo,1}],1} =
  723:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar",1, [{reserved_word_fun,
  724:                                          fun(W) -> W =:= foo end}]),
  725:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  726:         (catch {foo,
  727:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar",1, % type error
  728:                                 [{reserved_word_fun,
  729:                                   fun(W,_) -> W =:= foo end}])}),
  730:     ok.
  731: 
  732: more_options() ->
  733:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T1],{19,20}} =
  734:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[]),
  735:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  736:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T2,{dot,_}],{19,22}},[]} =
  737:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo. ", {19,17}, [bad_opt]), % type error
  738:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T2),
  739:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],{19,20}} =
  740:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[text]),
  741:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  742:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  743: 
  744:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],1} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, [text]),
  745:     1 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  746:     1 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  747:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  748: 
  749:     ok.
  750: 
  751: token_info() ->
  752:     {ok,[T1],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,18}, [text]),
  753:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  754:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:category(foo)}), % type error
  755:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  756:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:symbol(foo)}), % type error
  757:     atom = erl_scan:category(T1),
  758:     foo = erl_scan:symbol(T1),
  759: 
  760:     {ok,[T2],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, []),
  761:     1 = erl_scan:line(T2),
  762:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T2),
  763:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T2),
  764:     1 = erl_scan:location(T2),
  765: 
  766:     {ok,[T3],_} = erl_scan:string("=", 1, []),
  767:     '=' = erl_scan:category(T3),
  768:     '=' = erl_scan:symbol(T3),
  769:     ok.
  770: 
  771: anno_info() ->
  772:     {'EXIT',_} =
  773:         (catch {foo,erl_scan:line(foo)}), % type error
  774:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T0],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 19, [text]),
  775:     19 = erl_scan:location(T0),
  776:     19 = erl_scan:end_location(T0),
  777: 
  778:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, [text]),
  779:     1 = erl_scan:line(T3),
  780:     3 = erl_scan:column(T3),
  781:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  782:     {1,6} = erl_scan:end_location(T3),
  783:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  784: 
  785:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 2, [text]),
  786:     2 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  787:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T4),
  788:     2 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  789:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  790: 
  791:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T5],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, []),
  792:     1 = erl_scan:line(T5),
  793:     3 = erl_scan:column(T5),
  794:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T5),
  795:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T5),
  796: 
  797:     ok.
  798: 
  799: column_errors() ->
  800:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$',""}},{1,3}} = % $'
  801:         erl_scan:string("'\\",{1,1}),
  802:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$",""}},{1,3}} = % $"
  803:         erl_scan:string("\"\\",{1,1}),
  804: 
  805:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$',""}},{1,2}} =  % $'
  806:         erl_scan:string("'",{1,1}),
  807:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{string,$",""}},{1,2}} =  % $"
  808:         erl_scan:string("\"",{1,1}),
  809: 
  810:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,2}} =
  811:         erl_scan:string("$",{1,1}),
  812: 
  813:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$',"1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %'
  814:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  815:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$',"123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %'
  816:         erl_scan:string(" '123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  817:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$","1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %"
  818:         erl_scan:string(" \"12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  819:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$","123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %"
  820:         erl_scan:string(" \"123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  821:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{string,$',"1234567890123456"}},{2,1}} = %'
  822:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567\n", {1,1}),
  823:     ok.
  824: 
  825: white_spaces() ->
  826:     {ok,[{white_space,_,"\r"},
  827:                {white_space,_,"   "},
  828:                {atom,_,a},
  829:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  830:            _} = erl_scan_string("\r   a\n", {1,1}, return),
  831:     test("\r   a\n"),
  832:     L = "{\"a\nb\", \"a\\nb\",\nabc\r,def}.\n\n",
  833:     {ok,[{'{',_},
  834:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  835:                {',',_},
  836:                {white_space,_," "},
  837:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  838:                {',',_},
  839:                {white_space,_,"\n"},
  840:                {atom,_,abc},
  841:                {white_space,_,"\r"},
  842:                {',',_},
  843:                {atom,_,def},
  844:                {'}',_},
  845:                {dot,_},
  846:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  847:            _} = erl_scan_string(L, {1,1}, return),
  848:     test(L),
  849:     test("\"\n\"\n"),
  850:     test("\n\r\n"),
  851:     test("\n\r"),
  852:     test("\r\n"),
  853:     test("\n\f"),
  854:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\t)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  855:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\t)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  856:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\s)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  857:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\s)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  858:     test("\v\f\n\v "),
  859:     test("\n\e\n\b\f\n\da\n"),
  860:     ok.
  861: 
  862: unicode() ->
  863:     {ok,[{char,1,83},{integer,1,45}],1} =
  864:         erl_scan_string("$\\12345"), % not unicode
  865: 
  866:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  867:         erl_scan:string([1089]),
  868:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
  869:         erl_scan:string([1089], {1,1}),
  870:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
  871:         erl_scan:string("'a" ++ [999999999] ++ "c'", {1,1}),
  872: 
  873:     test("\"a"++[1089]++"b\""),
  874:     {ok,[{char,1,1}],1} =
  875:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,$^,1089], 1),
  876: 
  877:     {error,{1,erl_scan,Error},1} =
  878:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\x{aaa}", 1),
  879:     "unterminated string starting with \"qa"++[2730]++"\"" =
  880:         erl_scan:format_error(Error),
  881:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  882:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  883:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  884:         erl_scan:string("'qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  885: 
  886:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  887:         erl_scan_string([$$,1089], 1),
  888:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  889:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089], 1),
  890: 
  891:     Qs = "$\\x{aaa}",
  892:     {ok,[{char,1,$\x{aaa}}],1} =
  893:         erl_scan_string(Qs, 1),
  894:     {ok,[Q2],{1,9}} =
  895:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{aaa}", {1,1}, [text]),
  896:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
  897:         token_info_long(Q2),
  898: 
  899:     U1 = "\"\\x{aaa}\"",
  900:     {ok,[{string,_,[2730]}=T1],{1,10}} = erl_scan:string(U1, {1,1}, [text]),
  901:     {1,1} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  902:     "\"\\x{aaa}\"" = erl_scan:text(T1),
  903:     {ok,[{string,1,[2730]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U1, 1),
  904: 
  905:     U2 = "\"\\x41\\x{fff}\\x42\"",
  906:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\x41,$\x{fff},$\x42]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U2, 1),
  907: 
  908:     U3 = "\"a\n\\x{fff}\n\"",
  909:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$\n,$\x{fff},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U3, 1),
  910: 
  911:     U4 = "\"\\^\n\\x{aaa}\\^\n\"",
  912:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\n,$\x{aaa},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U4, 1),
  913: 
  914:     %% Keep these tests:
  915:     test(Qs),
  916:     test(U1),
  917:     test(U2),
  918:     test(U3),
  919:     test(U4),
  920: 
  921:     Str1 = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
  922:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],1} = erl_scan_string(Str1, 1),
  923:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],{1,8}} =
  924:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),
  925:     test(Str1),
  926:     Comment = "%% "++[1089],
  927:     {ok,[{comment,1,[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],1} =
  928:         erl_scan_string(Comment, 1, [return]),
  929:     {ok,[{comment,{1,1},[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],{1,5}} =
  930:         erl_scan_string(Comment, {1,1}, [return]),
  931:     ok.
  932: 
  933: more_chars() ->
  934:     %% Due to unicode, the syntax has been incompatibly augmented:
  935:     %% $\x{...}, $\xHH
  936: 
  937:     %% All kinds of tests...
  938:     {ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}} =
  939:         erl_scan_string("$\\{",{1,1}),
  940:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\{", {1,1}),
  941:     {done,{ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}},eof} =
  942:         erl_scan_tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  943:     {ok,[{char,1,123},{atom,1,a},{'}',1}],1} =
  944:         erl_scan_string("$\\{a}"),
  945: 
  946:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,4}} =
  947:         erl_scan:string("$\\x", {1,1}),
  948:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,5}} =
  949:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
  950:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x", {1,1}),
  951:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,4}},eof} =
  952:         erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
  953:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,5}} =
  954:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
  955:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x{", {1,1}),
  956:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,char},{1,5}},eof} =
  957:         erl_scan:tokens(C2, eof, 1),
  958:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  959:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}"),
  960:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
  961:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}", {1,1}),
  962:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,6}} =
  963:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{}",{1,1}),
  964: 
  965:     test("\"\\{0}\""),
  966:     test("\"\\x{0}\""),
  967:     test("\'\\{0}\'"),
  968:     test("\'\\x{0}\'"),
  969: 
  970:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
  971:         erl_scan:string("\"ab \n $\\x{g}\"",{1,1}),
  972:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
  973:         erl_scan:string("\'ab \n $\\x{g}\'",{1,1}),
  974: 
  975:     test("$\\{34}"),
  976:     test("$\\x{34}"),
  977:     test("$\\{377}"),
  978:     test("$\\x{FF}"),
  979:     test("$\\{400}"),
  980:     test("$\\x{100}"),
  981:     test("$\\x{10FFFF}"),
  982:     test("$\\x{10ffff}"),
  983:     test("\"$\n \\{1}\""),
  984:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  985:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}"),
  986:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,12}} =
  987:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}", {1,1}),
  988: 
  989:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
  990:         erl_scan:string("$\\xfg", {1,1}),
  991: 
  992:     test("$\\xffg"),
  993: 
  994:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
  995:         erl_scan:string("$\\xg", {1,1}),
  996:     ok.
  997: 
  998: %% OTP-10302. Unicode characters scanner/parser.
  999: otp_10302(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1000:     %% From unicode():
 1001:     {ok,[{atom,1,'aсb'}],1} =
 1002:         erl_scan_string("'a"++[1089]++"b'", 1),
 1003:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},'qaપ'}],{1,12}} =
 1004:         erl_scan_string("'qa\\x{aaa}'",{1,1}),
 1005: 
 1006:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} = erl_scan_string([$$,1089], 1),
 1007:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} = erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089],1),
 1008: 
 1009:     Qs = "$\\x{aaa}",
 1010:     {ok,[{char,1,2730}],1} = erl_scan_string(Qs, 1),
 1011:     {ok,[Q2],{1,9}} = erl_scan:string(Qs,{1,1},[text]),
 1012:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
 1013:         token_info_long(Q2),
 1014: 
 1015:     U1 = "\"\\x{aaa}\"",
 1016:     {ok,[T1],{1,10}} = erl_scan:string(U1, {1,1}, [text]),
 1017:     [{category,string},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,[16#aaa]},{text,U1}] =
 1018:         token_info_long(T1),
 1019: 
 1020:     U2 = "\"\\x41\\x{fff}\\x42\"",
 1021:     {ok,[{string,1,[65,4095,66]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U2, 1),
 1022: 
 1023:     U3 = "\"a\n\\x{fff}\n\"",
 1024:     {ok,[{string,1,[97,10,4095,10]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U3, 1),
 1025: 
 1026:     U4 = "\"\\^\n\\x{aaa}\\^\n\"",
 1027:     {ok,[{string,1,[10,2730,10]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U4, 1,[]),
 1028: 
 1029:     Str1 = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
 1030:     {ok,[{string,1,[97,98,1089,99,100]}],1} =
 1031:         erl_scan_string(Str1,1),
 1032:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[97,98,1089,99,100]}],{1,8}} =
 1033:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),
 1034: 
 1035:     OK1 = 16#D800-1,
 1036:     OK2 = 16#DFFF+1,
 1037:     OK3 = 16#FFFE-1,
 1038:     OK4 = 16#FFFF+1,
 1039:     OKL = [OK1,OK2,OK3,OK4],
 1040: 
 1041:     Illegal1 = 16#D800,
 1042:     Illegal2 = 16#DFFF,
 1043:     Illegal3 = 16#FFFE,
 1044:     Illegal4 = 16#FFFF,
 1045:     IllegalL = [Illegal1,Illegal2,Illegal3,Illegal4],
 1046: 
 1047:     [{ok,[{comment,1,[$%,$%,$\s,OK]}],1} =
 1048:          erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK], 1, [return]) ||
 1049:         OK <- OKL],
 1050:     {ok,[{comment,_,[$%,$%,$\s,OK1]}],{1,5}} =
 1051:         erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, [return]),
 1052:     [{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1053:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, [return]) ||
 1054:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1055:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1056:         erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal1], {1,1}, [return]),
 1057: 
 1058:     [{ok,[],1} = erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK], 1, []) ||
 1059:         OK <- OKL],
 1060:     {ok,[],{1,5}} = erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, []),
 1061:     [{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1062:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, []) ||
 1063:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1064:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1065:         erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal1], {1,1}, []),
 1066: 
 1067:     [{ok,[{string,{1,1},[OK]}],{1,4}} =
 1068:         erl_scan_string("\""++[OK]++"\"",{1,1}) ||
 1069:         OK <- OKL],
 1070:     [{error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,3}} =
 1071:          erl_scan:string("\""++[OK]++"\"",{1,1}) ||
 1072:         OK <- IllegalL],
 1073: 
 1074:     [{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
 1075:         erl_scan:string([Illegal],{1,1}) ||
 1076:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1077: 
 1078:     {ok,[{char,{1,1},OK1}],{1,3}} =
 1079:         erl_scan_string([$$,OK1],{1,1}),
 1080:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
 1081:         erl_scan:string([$$,Illegal1],{1,1}),
 1082: 
 1083:     {ok,[{char,{1,1},OK1}],{1,4}} =
 1084:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,OK1],{1,1}),
 1085:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1086:         erl_scan:string([$$,$\\,Illegal1],{1,1}),
 1087: 
 1088:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[55295]}],{1,5}} =
 1089:         erl_scan_string("\"\\"++[OK1]++"\"",{1,1}),
 1090:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1091:         erl_scan:string("\"\\"++[Illegal1]++"\"",{1,1}),
 1092: 
 1093:     {ok,[{char,{1,1},OK1}],{1,10}} =
 1094:         erl_scan_string("$\\x{D7FF}",{1,1}),
 1095:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,10}} =
 1096:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{D800}",{1,1}),
 1097: 
 1098:     %% Not erl_scan, but erl_parse.
 1099:     {integer,0,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1),
 1100:     Float = 3.14, {float,0,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float),
 1101:     {nil,0} = erl_parse_abstract([]),
 1102:     {bin,0,
 1103:      [{bin_element,0,{integer,0,1},default,default},
 1104:       {bin_element,0,{integer,0,2},default,default}]} =
 1105:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>),
 1106:     {cons,0,{tuple,0,[{atom,0,a}]},{atom,0,b}} =
 1107:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b]),
 1108:     {string,0,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str"),
 1109:     {cons,0,
 1110:      {integer,0,$a},
 1111:      {cons,0,{integer,0,55296},{string,0,"c"}}} =
 1112:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c"),
 1113: 
 1114:     Line = 17,
 1115:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Line),
 1116:     Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Line),
 1117:     {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Line),
 1118:     {bin,Line,
 1119:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},
 1120:       {bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,2},default,default}]} =
 1121:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Line),
 1122:     {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1123:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Line),
 1124:     {string,Line,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str", Line),
 1125:     {cons,Line,
 1126:      {integer,Line,$a},
 1127:      {cons,Line,{integer,Line,55296},{string,Line,"c"}}} =
 1128:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c", Line),
 1129: 
 1130:     Opts1 = [{line,17}],
 1131:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts1),
 1132:     Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Opts1),
 1133:     {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Opts1),
 1134:     {bin,Line,
 1135:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},
 1136:       {bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,2},default,default}]} =
 1137:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Opts1),
 1138:     {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1139:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Opts1),
 1140:     {string,Line,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str", Opts1),
 1141:     {cons,Line,
 1142:      {integer,Line,$a},
 1143:      {cons,Line,{integer,Line,55296},{string,Line,"c"}}} =
 1144:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c", Opts1),
 1145: 
 1146:     [begin
 1147:          {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts2),
 1148:          Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Opts2),
 1149:          {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Opts2),
 1150:          {bin,Line,
 1151:           [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},
 1152:            {bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,2},default,default}]} =
 1153:              erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Opts2),
 1154:          {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1155:              erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Opts2),
 1156:          {string,Line,"str"} = erl_parse_abstract("str", Opts2),
 1157:          {string,Line,[97,1024,99]} =
 1158:              erl_parse_abstract("a"++[1024]++"c", Opts2)
 1159:      end || Opts2 <- [[{encoding,unicode},{line,Line}],
 1160:                       [{encoding,utf8},{line,Line}]]],
 1161: 
 1162:     {cons,0,
 1163:      {integer,0,97},
 1164:      {cons,0,{integer,0,1024},{string,0,"c"}}} =
 1165:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[1024]++"c", [{encoding,latin1}]),
 1166:     ok.

 1173: %% OTP-10992. List of floats to abstract format.
 1174: otp_10992(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1175:     {cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}} =
 1176:         erl_parse_abstract([42.0], [{encoding,unicode}]),
 1177:     {cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}} =
 1178:         erl_parse_abstract([42.0], [{encoding,utf8}]),
 1179:     {cons,0,{integer,0,65},{cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}}} =
 1180:         erl_parse_abstract([$A,42.0], [{encoding,unicode}]),
 1181:     {cons,0,{integer,0,65},{cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}}} =
 1182:         erl_parse_abstract([$A,42.0], [{encoding,utf8}]),
 1183:     ok.

 1185: %% OTP-11807. Generalize erl_parse:abstract/2.
 1186: otp_11807(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1187:     {cons,0,{integer,0,97},{cons,0,{integer,0,98},{nil,0}}} =
 1188:         erl_parse_abstract("ab", [{encoding,none}]),
 1189:     {cons,0,{integer,0,-1},{nil,0}} =
 1190:         erl_parse_abstract([-1], [{encoding,latin1}]),
 1191:     ASCII = fun(I) -> I >= 0 andalso I < 128 end,
 1192:     {string,0,"xyz"} = erl_parse_abstract("xyz", [{encoding,ASCII}]),
 1193:     {cons,0,{integer,0,228},{nil,0}} =
 1194:         erl_parse_abstract([228], [{encoding,ASCII}]),
 1195:     {cons,0,{integer,0,97},{atom,0,a}} =
 1196:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++a, [{encoding,latin1}]),

 1198:          (catch erl_parse:abstract("string", [{encoding,bad}])),
 1199:    ok.

 1206: otp_17024(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1207:     Line = 17,
 1208:     Opts1 = [{location,Line}],
 1209:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts1),
 1210:     Location = {17, 42},
 1211:     {integer,Location,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Location),
 1212:     Opts2 = [{location,Location}],
 1213:     {integer,Location,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts2),
 1214:     ok.
 1215: 
 1216: text_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1217:     KeepClass = fun(Class) ->
 1218:                         fun(C, _) -> C == Class end
 1219:                 end,
 1220: 
 1221:     Join = fun(L, S) -> string:join(L, S) end,
 1222:     String = fun(L) -> Join(L, " ") end,
 1223: 
 1224:     TextAtom = KeepClass(atom),
 1225:     TextInt = KeepClass(integer),
 1226:     %% Keep text for integers written with a base.
 1227:     TextBase = fun(C, S) ->
 1228:                        C == integer andalso string:find(S, "#") /= nomatch
 1229:                end,
 1230:     %% Keep text for long strings, regardless of class
 1231:     TextLong = fun(_, S) -> length(S) > 10 end,
 1232: 
 1233:     Texts = fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1234:     Values =  fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:symbol(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1235: 
 1236:     Atom1 = "foo",
 1237:     Atom2 = "'this is a long atom'",
 1238:     Int1 = "42",
 1239:     Int2 = "16#10",
 1240:     Int3 = "8#20",
 1241:     Int4 = "16",
 1242:     Int5 = "12345678901234567890",
 1243:     String1 = "\"A String\"",
 1244:     String2 = "\"guitar string\"",
 1245:     Name1 = "Short",
 1246:     Name2 = "LongAndDescriptiveName",
 1247:     Sep1 = "{",
 1248:     Sep2 = "+",
 1249:     Sep3 = "]",
 1250:     Sep4 = "/",
 1251: 
 1252:     All = [Atom1, Atom2, Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4, Int5,
 1253:            String1, String2, Name1, Name2,
 1254:            Sep1, Sep2, Sep3, Sep4],
 1255: 
 1256:     {ok, Tokens0, 2} =
 1257:         erl_scan:string(String([Atom1, Int1]), 2, [{text_fun, TextAtom}]),
 1258:     [Atom1, undefined] = Texts(Tokens0),
 1259:     [foo, 42] = Values(Tokens0),
 1260: 
 1261:     {ok, Tokens1, 3} =
 1262:         erl_scan:string(Join([Int2, Int3, Int4], "\n"), 1,
 1263:                         [{text_fun, TextInt}]),
 1264:     [Int2, Int3, Int4] = Texts(Tokens1),
 1265:     [16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens1),
 1266: 
 1267:     TS = [Int2, String1, Atom1, Int3, Int4, String2],
 1268:     {ok, Tokens2, 6} =
 1269:         %% If text is present, we supply text for *all* tokens.
 1270:         erl_scan:string(Join(TS, "\n"), 1, [{text_fun, TextAtom}, text]),
 1271:     TS = Texts(Tokens2),
 1272:     [16, "A String", foo, 16, 16, "guitar string"] = Values(Tokens2),
 1273: 
 1274:     Ints = [Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4],
 1275:     {ok, Tokens3, 1} = erl_scan:string(String(Ints), 1, [{text_fun, TextBase}]),
 1276:     [undefined, Int2, Int3, undefined] = Texts(Tokens3),
 1277:     [42, 16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens3),
 1278: 
 1279:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(S) -> length(S) > 10 end, All),
 1280:     {ok, Tokens4, 1} =
 1281:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 1, [{text_fun, TextLong}]),
 1282:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens4)),
 1283: 
 1284:     {ok, Tokens5, 7} =
 1285:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 7, [{text_fun, KeepClass('{')}]),
 1286:     [Sep1] = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens5)).
 1287: 
 1288: 
 1289: test_string(String, ExpectedWithCol) ->
 1290:     {ok, ExpectedWithCol, _EndWithCol} = erl_scan_string(String, {1, 1}, []),
 1291:     Expected = [ begin
 1292:                      {L,_C} = element(2, T),
 1293:                      setelement(2, T, L)
 1294:                  end
 1295:                     || T <- ExpectedWithCol ],
 1296:     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan_string(String),
 1297:     test(String).
 1298: 
 1299: erl_scan_string(String) ->
 1300:     erl_scan_string(String, 1, []).
 1301: 
 1302: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation) ->
 1303:     erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, []).
 1304: 
 1305: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1306:     case erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options) of
 1307:         {ok, Tokens, EndLocation} ->
 1308:             {ok, unopaque_tokens(Tokens), EndLocation};
 1309:         Else ->
 1310:             Else
 1311:     end.
 1312: 
 1313: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L) ->
 1314:     erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, []).
 1315: 
 1316: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, O) ->
 1317:     case erl_scan:tokens(C, S, L, O) of
 1318:         {done, {ok, Ts, End}, R} ->
 1319:             {done, {ok, unopaque_tokens(Ts), End}, R};
 1320:         Else ->
 1321:             Else
 1322:     end.
 1323: 
 1324: unopaque_tokens([]) ->
 1325:     [];
 1326: unopaque_tokens([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1327:     Attrs = element(2, Token),
 1328:     Term = erl_anno:to_term(Attrs),
 1329:     T = setelement(2, Token, Term),
 1330:     [T | unopaque_tokens(Tokens)].
 1331: 
 1332: erl_parse_abstract(Term) ->
 1333:     erl_parse_abstract(Term, []).
 1334: 
 1335: erl_parse_abstract(Term, Options) ->
 1336:     Abstr = erl_parse:abstract(Term, Options),
 1337:     unopaque_abstract(Abstr).
 1338: 
 1339: unopaque_abstract(Abstr) ->
 1340:     erl_parse:anno_to_term(Abstr).
 1341: 
 1342: %% test_string(String, Expected, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1343: %%     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options),
 1344: %%     test(String).
 1345: 
 1346: %% There are no checks of the tags...
 1347: test(String) ->
 1348:     %% io:format("Testing `~ts'~n", [String]),
 1349:     [{Tokens, End},
 1350:      {Wtokens, Wend},
 1351:      {Ctokens, Cend},
 1352:      {CWtokens, CWend},
 1353:      {CWtokens2, _}] =
 1354:         [scan_string_with_column(String, X) ||
 1355:             X <- [[],
 1356:                   [return_white_spaces],
 1357:                   [return_comments],
 1358:                   [return],
 1359:                   [return]]], % for white space compaction test
 1360: 
 1361:     {end1,End,Wend} = {end1,Wend,End},
 1362:     {end2,Wend,Cend} = {end2,Cend,Wend},
 1363:     {end3,Cend,CWend} = {end3,CWend,Cend},
 1364: 
 1365:     %% Test that the tokens that are common to two token lists are identical.
 1366:     {none,Tokens} = {none, filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space,comment])},
 1367:     {comments,Ctokens} =
 1368:         {comments,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space])},
 1369:     {white_spaces,Wtokens} =
 1370:         {white_spaces,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [comment])},
 1371: 
 1372:     %% Use token attributes to extract parts from the original string,
 1373:     %% and check that the parts are identical to the token strings.
 1374:     {Line,Column} = test_decorated_tokens(String, CWtokens),
 1375:     {deco,{Line,Column},End} = {deco,End,{Line,Column}},
 1376: 
 1377:     %% Almost the same again: concat texts to get the original:
 1378:     Text = get_text(CWtokens),
 1379:     {text,Text,String} = {text,String,Text},
 1380: 
 1381:     %% Test that white spaces occupy less heap than the worst case.
 1382:     ok = test_white_space_compaction(CWtokens, CWtokens2),
 1383: 
 1384:     %% Test that white newlines are always first in text:
 1385:     WhiteTokens = select_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space]),
 1386:     ok = newlines_first(WhiteTokens),
 1387: 
 1388:     %% Line attribute only:
 1389:     [Simple,Wsimple,Csimple,WCsimple] = Simples =
 1390:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, Opts)) ||
 1391:             Opts <- [[],
 1392:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1393:                      [return_comments],
 1394:                      [return]]],
 1395:     {consistent,true} = {consistent,consistent_attributes(Simples)},
 1396:     {simple_wc,WCsimple} = {simple_wc,simplify(CWtokens)},
 1397:     {simple,Simple} = {simple,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space,comment])},
 1398:     {simple_c,Csimple} = {simple_c,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space])},
 1399:     {simple_w,Wsimple} = {simple_w,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [comment])},
 1400: 
 1401:     %% Line attribute only, with text:
 1402:     [SimpleTxt,WsimpleTxt,CsimpleTxt,WCsimpleTxt] = SimplesTxt =
 1403:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, [text|Opts])) ||
 1404:             Opts <- [[],
 1405:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1406:                      [return_comments],
 1407:                      [return]]],
 1408:     TextTxt = get_text(WCsimpleTxt),
 1409:     {text_txt,TextTxt,String} = {text_txt,String,TextTxt},
 1410:     {consistent_txt,true} =
 1411:         {consistent_txt,consistent_attributes(SimplesTxt)},
 1412:     {simple_txt,SimpleTxt} =
 1413:         {simple_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space,comment])},
 1414:     {simple_c_txt,CsimpleTxt} =
 1415:         {simple_c_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space])},
 1416:     {simple_w_txt,WsimpleTxt} =
 1417:         {simple_w_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [comment])},
 1418: 
 1419:     ok.
 1420: 
 1421: test_white_space_compaction(Tokens, Tokens2) when Tokens =:= Tokens2 ->
 1422:     [WS, WS2] = [select_tokens(Ts, [white_space]) || Ts <- [Tokens, Tokens2]],
 1423:     test_wsc(WS, WS2).
 1424: 
 1425: test_wsc([], []) ->
 1426:     ok;
 1427: test_wsc([Token|Tokens], [Token2|Tokens2]) ->
 1428:     [Text, Text2] = [Text ||
 1429:                         Text <- [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- [Token, Token2]]],
 1430:     Sz = erts_debug:size(Text),
 1431:     Sz2 = erts_debug:size({Text, Text2}),
 1432:     IsCompacted = Sz2 < 2*Sz+erts_debug:size({a,a}),
 1433:     ToBeCompacted = is_compacted(Text),
 1434:     if
 1435:         IsCompacted =:= ToBeCompacted ->
 1436:             test_wsc(Tokens, Tokens2);
 1437:         true ->
 1438:             {compaction_error, Token}
 1439:     end.
 1440: 
 1441: is_compacted("\r") ->
 1442:     true;
 1443: is_compacted("\n\r") ->
 1444:     true;
 1445: is_compacted("\n\f") ->
 1446:     true;
 1447: is_compacted([$\n|String]) ->
 1448:       all_spaces(String)
 1449:     orelse
 1450:       all_tabs(String);
 1451: is_compacted(String) ->
 1452:       all_spaces(String)
 1453:     orelse
 1454:       all_tabs(String).
 1455: 
 1456: all_spaces(L) ->
 1457:     all_same(L, $\s).
 1458: 
 1459: all_tabs(L) ->
 1460:     all_same(L, $\t).
 1461: 
 1462: all_same(L, Char) ->
 1463:     lists:all(fun(C) -> C =:= Char end, L).
 1464: 
 1465: newlines_first([]) ->
 1466:     ok;
 1467: newlines_first([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1468:     Text = erl_scan:text(Token),
 1469:     Nnls = length([C || C <- Text, C =:= $\n]),
 1470:     OK = case Text of
 1471:              [$\n|_] ->
 1472:                  Nnls =:= 1;
 1473:              _ ->
 1474:                  Nnls =:= 0
 1475:          end,
 1476:     if
 1477:         OK -> newlines_first(Tokens);
 1478:         true -> OK
 1479:     end.
 1480: 
 1481: filter_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1482:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> not lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1483: 
 1484: select_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1485:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1486: 
 1487: simplify([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1488:     Line = erl_scan:line(Token),
 1489:     [setelement(2, Token, erl_anno:new(Line)) | simplify(Tokens)];
 1490: simplify([]) ->
 1491:     [].
 1492: 
 1493: get_text(Tokens) ->
 1494:     lists:flatten(
 1495:       [T ||
 1496:           Token <- Tokens,
 1497:           (T = erl_scan:text(Token)) =/= []]).
 1498: 
 1499: test_decorated_tokens(String, Tokens) ->
 1500:     ToksAttrs = token_attrs(Tokens),
 1501:     test_strings(ToksAttrs, String, 1, 1).
 1502: 
 1503: token_attrs(Tokens) ->
 1504:     [{L,C,length(T),T} ||
 1505:         Token <- Tokens,
 1506:         ([C,L,T] = token_info(Token)) =/= []].
 1507: 
 1508: token_info(T) ->
 1509:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1510:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1511:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1512:     [Column, Line, Text].
 1513: 
 1514: token_info_long(T) ->
 1515:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1516:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1517:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1518:     Category = erl_scan:category(T),
 1519:     Symbol = erl_scan:symbol(T),
 1520:     [{category,Category},{column,Column},{line,Line},
 1521:      {symbol,Symbol},{text,Text}].
 1522: 
 1523: test_strings([], _S, Line, Column) ->
 1524:     {Line,Column};
 1525: test_strings([{L,C,Len,T}=Attr|Attrs], String0, Line0, Column0) ->
 1526:     {String1, Column1} = skip_newlines(String0, L, Line0, Column0),
 1527:     String = skip_chars(String1, C-Column1),
 1528:     {Str,Rest} = lists:split(Len, String),
 1529:     if
 1530:         Str =:= T ->
 1531:             {Line,Column} = string_newlines(T, L, C),
 1532:             test_strings(Attrs, Rest, Line, Column);
 1533:         true ->
 1534:             {token_error, Attr, Str}
 1535:     end.
 1536: 
 1537: skip_newlines(String, Line, Line, Column) ->
 1538:     {String, Column};
 1539: skip_newlines([$\n|String], L, Line, _Column) ->
 1540:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line+1, 1);
 1541: skip_newlines([_|String], L, Line, Column) ->
 1542:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line, Column+1).
 1543: 
 1544: skip_chars(String, 0) ->
 1545:     String;
 1546: skip_chars([_|String], N) ->
 1547:     skip_chars(String, N-1).
 1548: 
 1549: string_newlines([$\n|String], Line, _Column) ->
 1550:     string_newlines(String, Line+1, 1);
 1551: string_newlines([], Line, Column) ->
 1552:     {Line, Column};
 1553: string_newlines([_|String], Line, Column) ->
 1554:     string_newlines(String, Line, Column+1).
 1555: 
 1556: scan_string_with_column(String, Options0) ->
 1557:     Options = [text | Options0],
 1558:     StartLoc = {1, 1},
 1559:     {ok, Ts1, End1} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLoc, Options),
 1560:     TString = String ++ ". ",
 1561:     {ok,Ts2,End2} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1562:     {ok, Ts3, End3} =
 1563:         scan_tokens_1({more, []}, TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1564:     {end_2,End2,End3} = {end_2,End3,End2},
 1565:     {EndLine1,EndColumn1} = End1,
 1566:     End2 = {EndLine1,EndColumn1+2},
 1567:     {ts_1,Ts2,Ts3} = {ts_1,Ts3,Ts2},
 1568:     Ts2 = Ts1 ++ [lists:last(Ts2)],
 1569: 
 1570:     %% Attributes are keylists, but have no text.
 1571:     {ok, Ts7, End7} = erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}, Options),
 1572:     {ok, Ts8, End8} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], {1,1}),
 1573:     {end1, End1} = {end1, End7},
 1574:     {end2, End2} = {end2, End8},
 1575:     Ts8 = Ts7 ++ [lists:last(Ts8)],
 1576:     {cons,true} = {cons,consistent_attributes([Ts1,Ts2,Ts3,Ts7,Ts8])},
 1577: 
 1578:     {Ts1, End1}.
 1579: 
 1580: scan_tokens(String, Options, Rs, Location) ->
 1581:     case erl_scan:tokens([], String, Location, Options) of
 1582:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""} ->
 1583:             {ok, lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])), End};
 1584:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest} ->
 1585:             scan_tokens(Rest, Options, [Ts|Rs], End)
 1586:     end.
 1587: 
 1588: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""}, "", _Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1589:     {ok,lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])),End};
 1590: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest}, Cs, Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1591:     scan_tokens_1({more,[]}, Rest++Cs, Options, [Ts|Rs], End);
 1592: scan_tokens_1({more, Cont}, [C | Cs], Options, Rs, Loc) ->
 1593:     R = erl_scan:tokens(Cont, [C], Loc, Options),
 1594:     scan_tokens_1(R, Cs, Options, Rs, Loc).
 1595: 
 1596: consistent_attributes([]) ->
 1597:     true;
 1598: consistent_attributes([Ts | TsL]) ->
 1599:     L = [T || T <- Ts, is_integer(element(2, T))],
 1600:     case L of
 1601:         [] ->
 1602:             TagsL = [[Tag || {Tag,_} <- defined(token_info_long(T))] ||
 1603:                         T <- Ts],
 1604:             case lists:usort(TagsL) of
 1605:                 [_] ->
 1606:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1607:                 [] when Ts =:= [] ->
 1608:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1609:                 _ ->
 1610:                     Ts
 1611:             end;
 1612:         Ts ->
 1613:             consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1614:         _ ->
 1615:             Ts
 1616:     end.
 1617: 
 1618: defined(L) ->
 1619:     [{T,V} || {T,V} <- L, V =/= undefined].
 1620: 
 1621: family_list(L) ->
 1622:     sofs:to_external(family(L)).
 1623: 
 1624: family(L) ->
 1625:     sofs:relation_to_family(sofs:relation(L)).
